nexoclom2.utilities.database_operations¶

Classes¶

DatabaseOperations

Manage the TinyDB database

Module Contents¶

class nexoclom2.utilities.database_operations.DatabaseOperations¶

Manage the TinyDB database

Parameters:
None
Attributes:
dp_pathstr

Path to the database file as specified in the nexoclom configuration file.

db_path¶
classmethod reset_database()¶
make_acceptable(inputs) → dict¶

Takes a Python input-type class and converts it to a saveable format.

The input classes (Geometry, etc.) have objects that can not be stored in the TinyDB format (cannot be converted to json). This function cleans things up.

Returns:
Dict object that can be inserted ito the database
insert_inputs(inputs)¶

Inserts inputs object into database Adds the individual pieces of the inputs object into their respective database tables and creates a unique record in the inputs table for the complete set that will be associated with the saved outputs. There should only be one savedfile for each unique set of inputs

Parameters:
inputsInput
kwargs

kwargs contains pieces from the output that need to be saved such as number of packets run and whether the output is compressed. More items TDB.

Returns:
Document id associated with the complete set of inputs
search_inputs(inputs)¶
delete_inputs(doc_id)¶
return_table(tablename: str)¶

Retrieve all records for an input classes (inputs.geometry, etc.)

Parameters:
tablenamestr
Returns:
List of TinyDB Documents if there are any; None if not.
